subject: p15338518
Findings: The newly placed Dobhoff tube reaches till the lower esophagus and loops back all the way up to the cervical esophagus. Consider repositioning the Dobhoff tube. Since, there are no relevant changes in the lungs. Minimal left lower lung atelectasis has improved. No new lung opacities concerning for pneumonia. Top normal heart size, mediastinal and hilar contours are stable in appearance. No pleural effusion. Findings were discussed with Dr. On at 5:23 pm.
